item.title: New version: math/py-keras version 3.7.0_py312
item.description: Keras 3 is a multi-backend deep learning framework, with support for JAX, TensorFlow, and PyTorch.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/py-scvi-tools version 1.2.1_py312
item.description: scvi-tools (single-cell variational inference tools) is a package for probabilistic modeling of single-cell omics data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/py-jax version 0.4.36_py312
item.description: JAX is Autograd and XLA, brought together for high-performance numerical computing.

item.title: New version: math/py-jaxlib version 0.4.36_py312
item.description: XLA library for Jax.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/py-warp-lang version 1.5.0_py312
item.description: Warp is a Python framework for writing high-performance simulation and graphics code.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/amr-wind version 3.2.0
item.description: AMR-Wind is a massively parallel, block-structured adaptive-mesh, incompressible flow solver for wind turbine and wind farm simulations.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: physics/openfast version 3.5.4
item.description: OpenFAST is a multi-physics, multi-fidelity tool for simulating the coupled dynamic response of wind turbines.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/c-blosc2 version 2.15.2
item.description: A fast, compressed, persistent binary data store library for C.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/c-blosc version 1.21.6
item.description: A blocking, shuffling and loss-less compression library that can be faster than memcpy().
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/py-numba version 0.59.1_py39
item.description: Numba is a compiler for Python array and numerical functions that gives you the power to speed up your applications with high performance functions written directly in Python..
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/py-deeplabcut version 2.3.10_py39
item.description: A software package for animal pose estimation.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/py-tables version 3.10.1_py312
item.description: A Python package to manage extremely large amounts of data.

item.title: New module: math/cudss version 0.3.0.9
item.description: NVIDIA cuDSS is an optimized, first-generation GPU-accelerated Direct Sparse Solver library for solving linear systems with very sparse matrices.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/ncbi-blast+ version 2.16.0
item.description: NCBI BLAST+ is a suite of command-line tools to run BLAST (Basic Local Alignment Search Tool), an algorithm for comparing primary biological sequence information.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/py-kaggle version 1.6.3_py312
item.description: Official API for https
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/py-scenicplus version 1.0.0_py39
item.description: SCENIC+ is a python package to build enhancer driven gene regulatory networks (GRNs) using combined or separate single-cell gene expression (scRNA-seq) and single-cell chromatin accessibility (scATAC-seq) data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-torch-scatter version 2.1.2_py312
item.description: PyTorch Extension Library of Optimized Scatter Operations.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-deepspeed version 0.15.4_py312
item.description: DeepSpeed is a deep learning optimization library that makes distributed training and inference easy, efficient, and effective.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-wandb version 0.18.7_py312
item.description: WandB (Weights and Biases) is a machine learning development platform that enables data scientists and machine learning engineers to track, visualize, and reproduce their experiments in real-time.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/bases2fastq version 2.0.0
item.description: The Bases2Fastq Software demultiplexess sequencing data from Element instruments and converts base calls into FASTQ files for secondary analysis with the FASTQ-compatible software of your choice.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/munge version 0.5.16
item.description: MUNGE (MUNGE Uid 'N' Gid Emporium) is an authentication service for creating and validating user credentials.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/cudnn version 9.4.0
item.description: NVIDIA cuDNN is a GPU-accelerated library of primitives for deep neural networks.

item.description: UCC is a collective communication operations API and library that is flexible, complete, and feature-rich for current and emerging programming models and runtimes.

item.description: AMR-Wind is a massively parallel, block-structured adaptive-mesh, incompressible flow solver for wind turbine and wind farm simulations.

item.title: New module: chemistry/py-fatslim version 0.2.2_py39
item.description: FATSLiM stands for “Fast Analysis Toolbox for Simulations of Lipid Membranes” and its goal is to provide an efficient, yet robust, tool to extract physical parameters from MD trajectories.

item.title: New module: math/py-ultralytics version 8.3.14_py312
item.description: Ultra YOLO11 is a cutting-edge, state-of-the-art (SOTA) model that builds upon the success of previous YOLO versions and introduces new features and improvements to further boost performance and flexibility.

item.description: Run VS Code on any machine anywhere and access it in the browser.

item.description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine. It provides the npm package manager.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/hypre version 2.32.0
item.description: HYPRE is a library of high performance preconditioners and solvers featuring multigrid methods for the solution of large, sparse linear systems of equations on massively parallel computers.

item.description: ORCA is a flexible, efficient and easy-to-use general purpose tool for quantum chemistry.

item.description: UCX is a communication library implementing high-performance messaging for MPI/PGAS frameworks.

item.title: New version: system/libpng version 1.6.44
item.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library. It supports almost all PNG features, is extensible, and has been extensively tested for over 20 years.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/zlib version 1.3.1
item.description: zlib is designed to be a free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered -- that is, not covered by any patents -- lossless data-compression library for use on virtually any computer hardware and operating system.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/py-biopython version 1.84_py312
item.description: Biopython is a set of freely available tools for biological computation written in Python.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: chemistry/vasp version 6.4.3
item.description: The Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package (VASP) is a computer program for atomic scale materials modelling, e.g. electronic structure calculations and quantum-mechanical molecular dynamics, from first principles.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/nvhpc version 24.7
item.description: NVIDIA HPC Software Development Kit (SDK) including C, C++, and Fortran compilers.

item.description: The GNU Compiler Collection includes front ends for C, C++, Fortran, Java, and Go, as well as libraries for these languages (libstdc++, libgcj,...).

item.title: New version: devel/gcc version 14.2.0
item.description: The GNU Compiler Collection includes front ends for C, C++, Fortran, Java, and Go, as well as libraries for these languages (libstdc++, libgcj,...).
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/opencv version 4.10.0
item.description: OpenCV (Open Source Computer Vision Library) is an open source computer vision and machine learning software library.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/hdf5 version 1.14.4
item.description: HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/openmpi version 5.0.5
item.description: The Open MPI Project is an open source Message Passing Interface implementation that is developed and maintained by a consortium of academic, research, and industry partners.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/py-scalene version 1.55.4_py312
item.description: Scalene is a high-performance, high-precision CPU, GPU, and memory profiler for Python with AI-powered optimization proposals
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/py-scalene version 1.55.4_py39
item.description: Scalene is a high-performance, high-precision CPU, GPU, and memory profiler for Python with AI-powered optimization proposals
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/py-nvidia-ml-py version 12.560.30_py312
item.description: Python bindings to the NVIDIA Management Library.

item.title: New version: system/py-nvidia-ml-py version 12.560.30_py39
item.description: Python bindings to the NVIDIA Management Library.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/java version 21.0.4
item.description: Java is a general-purpose computer programming language that is concurrent, class-based, object-oriented,[14] and specifically designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/nccl version 2.23.4
item.description: NCCL (pronounced 'Nickel') is a stand-alone library of standard collective communication routines, such as all-gather, reduce, broadcast, etc., that have been optimized to achieve high bandwidth over PCIe.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/nsight-systems version 2024.4
item.description: NVIDIA Nsight™ Systems is a system-wide performance analysis tool designed to visualize an application’s algorithms, identify the largest opportunities to optimize, and tune to scale efficiently across any quantity or size of CPUs and GPUs, from large servers to our smallest systems-on-a-chip (SoCs).
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/xcb-util-cursor version 0.1.5
item.description: The XCB util modules provides a number of libraries which sit on top of libxcb, the core X protocol library, and some of the extension libraries.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/xcb-proto version 1.17.0
item.description: xcb-proto provides the XML-XCB protocol descriptions that libxcb uses to generate the majority of its code and API.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/libxcb version 1.17.0
item.description: The X protocol C-language Binding (XCB) is a replacement for Xlib featuring a small footprint, latency hiding, direct access to the protocol, improved threading support, and extensibility.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/cuda version 12.6.1
item.description: CUDA is a parallel computing platform and application programming interface (API) model created by Nvidia. It allows software developers and software engineers to use a CUDA-enabled graphics processing unit (GPU) for general purpose processing.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/openblas version 0.3.28
item.description: OpenBLAS is an optimized BLAS library
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)
